description:
Let users add specific entities to a personal watchlist and receive notifications when those entities are modified, relationships change, or deadlines approach. Support bulk watchlist operations and watchlist templates for roles.

**Rationale:** Stakeholders need to monitor specific persons, engagements, or commitments without manually checking them. This proactive monitoring complements the notification system by focusing on user-selected priorities rather than activity-based triggers.
title: Entity Watchlist and Monitoring Alerts
